  <script type="text/javascript">
   if (window.location.hash &amp;&amp; window.location.hash == '#_=_') {
        window.location.hash = '';
    }
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   (function (i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {
        i['GoogleAnalyticsObject'] = r; i[r] = i[r] || function () {
            (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)
        }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date(); a = s.createElement(o),
        m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0]; a.async = 1; a.src = g; m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)
    })(window, document, 'script', '//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js', 'ga');

    ga('create', 'UA-37066016-1', 'muhlenberg.edu');
    var pageTitle = "Feedback";
    if (pageTitle == 'Error Page') {
        /* Track generic Errors */
        var url = "/error/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else if (pageTitle == '404 Error Page') {
        /* Track 404 Errors */
        var url = "/404/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else if (pageTitle == '500 Error Page') {
        /* Track 500 Errors */
        var url = "/500/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else {
        ga('send', 'pageview');
    }
    /**
    * Function that tracks a click on an outbound link in Google Analytics.
    * This function takes a valid URL string as an argument, and uses that URL string
    * as the event label. Setting the transport method to 'beacon' lets the hit be sent
    * using 'navigator.sendBeacon' in browser that support it.
    */
    var trackOutboundLink = function (url) {
        ga('send', 'event', 'outbound', 'click', url, {
            'transport': 'beacon'
        });
    }
    $(function () {
        $('a[href*="http://"], a[href*="https://"]').each(function (index) {
            var currentOnClick = $(this).attr("onclick");
            if (currentOnClick === undefined || currentOnClick === null || currentOnClick === "") {
                var href = $(this).attr("href");
                $(this).attr("onclick", "trackOutboundLink('" + href + "');");
            }
        });
    });
  </script>
 </head>
 <body>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   $(document).ready(function () {
            $("#tabs").tabs();
            $("#register").click(function () {
                $("#login-fields").hide();
                $("#create-new").show();
                //            alert("Clicked register");
            });
            $("#already-registered").click(function () {
                $("#create-new").hide();
                $("#login-fields").show();
                //            alert("Clicked Already Registered");
            });
            $("#SignIn").click(
                function () {
                });
            //variable to reference window
            $myWindow = $('#openid-box');
            //instantiate the dialog
            $myWindow.dialog({
                height: 550,
                width: 700,
                modal: true,
                position: 'center',
                autoOpen: false,
                title: 'Join us - It\'s Free!!!',
                beforeclose: function (event) { return $("dlgclose"); }
            });
            $("#dayFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = '';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = 'none';
                //alert("eventToday");
            });
            $("#weekFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = '';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = 'none';
                //alert("eventWeek");
            });
            $("#monthFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = '';
            });   
            var last = $("#nav #nav-stripe ul.pureCssMenu.pureCssMenum li.pureCssMenui0:last");
            last.hover(
		  function () {
		      var viewArea = $(window).width();
		      var offset = last.offset();
		      var outer = offset.left + 155;
		      var diff = "-88px"; //(viewArea - outer) + 'px';
		      if (viewArea &lt; outer) {
		          $(this).find("ul").css("left", diff);
		      }
		  },
		  function () {
		      $(this).find("ul").css("left", "0px");
		  }
	);
            //do not remove this line, it is used for later processing... 
        });
        //do not remove this line, it is used for later processing...
  </script>

   <div id="header-txt">
    By protecting and improving our environment, the communities where we do business and the students we serve, Muhlenberg Dining makes every day a better day and every tomorrow a better tomorrow.
   </div>

   <div id="subs-container">
    <div class="top-corners">
     <div class="tr-corner">

    </div>
    <div class="main-corners">
     <div class="column-66 float-left">
      <form id="main" action="/feedback" method="post">
       <h1>
        Getting Involved
       </h1>
       <p>
        Do you want to have a say in your dining program? Speak with a manager in any of the locations about your comments or concerns. In addition, you can be involved in the decision making process about new meal programs and ways to improve your dining program. We value your input! Comment Cards are a quick and simple way to to make suggestions and to get your question answered.
       </p>
       <p>
        Managers are always available during meals to help you. Get to know your dining room managers, and feel free to share your comments, suggestions or questions. We appreciate your feedback, and want to be a part of making your dining service what you want it to be! Feel free to stop in and see us or contact
        <a href="mailto:jpasquarello@muhlenberg.edu">
         John Pasquarello
        </a>
        at (484) 664-3488.
       </p>
       <fieldset>
        <legend>
         Contact Info
        </legend>
        <label>
         Name:
         <input name="name" type="text" id="name" title="Name" size="30" />
        </label>
        <br />
        <label>
         E-mail Address:
         <input name="email" type="text" id="email" title="Email" size="30" />
        </label>
        <label>
         Phone:
         <input name="phone" type="text" id="phone" title="Phone" size="13" />
        </label>
        <label>
         Customer Type:
         <select name="Customer" id="Customer" title="Campus Customer">
          <option value="Resident" selected="selected">
           Resident
          </option>
          <option value="Commuter">
           Commuter
          </option>
          <option value="Faculty / Staff">
           Faculty / Staff
          </option>
          <option value="Other">
           Other
          </option>
         </select>
        </label>
       </fieldset>
       <fieldset>
        <legend>
         Dining Experience
        </legend>
        <label>
         Location:
         <select name="Location" id="Location" title="Dining Location">
          <option value="Wood Dining Commons">
           Wood Dining Commons
          </option>
          <option value="Noshery North">
           Noshery North
          </option>
          <option value="Noshery South">
           Noshery South
          </option>
          <option value="The Wildfire Grille">
           The Wildfire Grille
          </option>
          <option value="Chew St. Deli">
           Chew St. Deli
          </option>
          <option value="Chef's Table">
           Chef's Table
          </option>
          <option value="Croutons">
           Croutons
          </option>
          <option value="Magellan's">
           Magellan's
          </option>
          <option value="Mangia Mangia">
           Mangia Mangia
          </option>
          <option value="The General's Quarters">
           The General's Quarters
          </option>
          <option value="The Mule Express">
           The Mule Express
          </option>
          <option value="Life Sports Center Cafe">
           Life Sports Center Cafe
          </option>

          </option>

           Cyclone Salads
          </option>
          <option value="Java Joe">
           Java Joe
          </option>
          <option value="Catering">
           Catering
          </option>
         </select>
        </label>
        <div class="ff-radios">
         Taste:
         <label>
          <input type="radio" name="Taste" value="great" id="taste-great" />
          Great
         </label>
         <label>
          <input type="radio" name="Taste" value="good" id="taste-good" />

         </label>

        </div>

         Presentation:
         <label>

         </label>
         <label>
          <input type="radio" name="presentation" value="fair" id="presentation-fair" />

         </label>

          Poor
         </label>
        </div>
        <div class="ff-radios">
         Customer Service:
         <label>
          <input type="radio" name="service" value="great" id="service-great" />
          Great
         </label>
         <label>
          <input type="radio" name="service" value="good" id="service-good" />
          Good
         </label>
         <label>
          <input type="radio" name="service" value="fair" id="service-fair" />
          Fair
         </label>
         <label>
          <input type="radio" name="service" value="poor" id="service-poor" />
          Poor
         </label>
        </div>
        <!--    &lt;div class="ff-radios"&gt;
                                   Food Temperature:
                                    
                                    
                                    &lt;label&gt;&lt;input type="radio" name="temp" value="great" id="temp-great"  /&gt;Great&lt;/label&gt;
                                    &lt;label&gt;&lt;input type="radio" name="temp" value="good" id="temp-good"  /&gt;Good&lt;/label&gt;
                                    
                                    &lt;label&gt;&lt;input type="radio" name="temp" value="fair" id="temp-fair"  /&gt;Fair&lt;/label&gt;  
                                    
                                    &lt;label&gt;&lt;input type="radio" name="temp" value="poor" id="temp-poor"  /&gt;Poor&lt;/label&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
                                    &lt;div class="ff-radios"&gt;
                                    Restaurant Cleanliness
                                    
                                    
                                    &lt;label&gt;&lt;input type="radio" name="cleanliness" value="great" id="cleanliness-great"  /&gt;Great&lt;/label&gt;
                                    &lt;label&gt;&lt;input type="radio" name="cleanliness" value="good" id="cleanliness-good"  /&gt;Good&lt;/label&gt;
                                    
                                    &lt;label&gt;&lt;input type="radio" name="cleanliness" value="fair" id="cleanliness-fair"  /&gt;Fair&lt;/label&gt;  
                                    
                                    &lt;label&gt;&lt;input type="radio" name="cleanliness" value="poor" id="cleanliness-poor"  /&gt;Poor&lt;/label&gt;
                               &lt;/div&gt; -->
       </fieldset>
       <fieldset>
        <legend>
         Feedback
        </legend>
        <label>
         Comments or Suggestions
         <textarea name="comments" rows="4" cols="40" wrap="physical" id="comments">
         </textarea>
        </label>
       </fieldset>
       <input type="hidden" name="formtype" value="feedback" />
       <input type="hidden" name="RedirectPage" value="/thanks.html" />
       <script type="text/javascript">
        $(".limit-checkbox").change(function(){
                    var limit = $(this).attr('data-limit');
                    checkboxes = $(this).find(":checkbox");
                    valid = checkboxes.filter(":checked").length &gt;= limit;
                    checkboxes.not(":checked").attr("disabled",valid);
                });
       </script>
       <p>
        <span style="font-weight: bold;">
         Note:
        </span>
        Please check the box below to enable form submission. If this step is skipped, the form will reset and your information will not be submitted.
       </p>
       <div class="g-recaptcha" data-sitekey="6Lcyyf4SAAAAALSWno7RN2RqBnYCMILW3fxcL2WX">
       </div>
       <p>
        <input type="button" value="Submit" onclick="accountRegistrationClick(this.form)" />
       </p>
      </form>
     </div>
     <div class="column-33 float-right">
      <div id="loggedin">
       <span id="span_loggedin">
       </span>
      </div>
      <div class="sub-news-top">
       <div class="sub-news-rt">
       </div>
      </div>
      <div id="sub-news">
       <!--   &lt;div id="side-col"&gt; -->
       <span class="RHS_Title">
        In This Section
       </span>

        <li>

          Meet the Team
         </a>

         <a href="/people/careers.html" title="Employment" target="_self">
          Employment
         </a>
        </li>
       </ul>
       <!-- &lt;/div&gt;-->
      </div>
      <div class="sub-news-bottom">
       <div class="sub-news-bottom-rt">
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
